description:
Hello & Welcome.
My place is close to great views, restaurants and dining, family-friendly activities, and nightlife.. You’ll love my place because of the ambiance, the outdoors space, the neighborhood, the light, and the comfy bed.. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

This fully renovated house instead to give people visiting New York  or relocating A safe , Furnished and comfortable place to stay without the High costs of hotel .
There is a main bedroom with a comfortable queen size bed ,flat screen T.V mini refrigerator and computer desk . Second bedroom is a master suite with a queen size bed and private full bathroom this floor have 2 full bath in total ! You can enjoy the third room with 2 twins beds .
The kitchen has all the amenities,new  stiainless steel appliances,refrigerator,oven/stove,microwave,cookware,coffe maker,etc..
The main living space has a couch you can enjoy the flatscreen cable T.V.
Dining area and  Penninsula island available for your meals.

You will be given a set of keys .
While the  neighborhood is quite and safe ,we ask you to lock the door when you come in and go .

We are accessible via text and telephone from 6am-until midnight.
We also plan to greet you upon your arrival and coordinate with you to get the keys when it's time for you to leave .
Please feel free to call/text for any reason or question.

We love this neighborhood it's a safe and convenient located one block from J train ,we are right across from forest park you can jog walk or ride a bike . Big playground for kids and big gated park for dogs located in the mid park . 
Close to all restaurants,supermarkets, Library ,post office .
About 7 min away from queens mall shopping center . 
5 min away from World resort casino NYC.

We are about 18 minutes  from JFK airport,you can take the AirTran connect to J and arrive to our house one block walking .
12 min from  LaGuardia airport which make for a cheap & quick taxi ride here (  exclude rush hour of course).
Car service available (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) hours .

Me and my wife Rose are ready to host you and make your stay one of a kind .
name: Charming Large 3 Br House Near Subway By The Park
review: The accommodation is ideally located for the J-train into Manhattan and North Queen's and a short taxi drive from JFK.  There are plenty of grocery stores if doing self catering and nearby launderettes, street vendors and pharmacy.
